raw_json.html_title: R Para Ciencia de Datos – Explorar – Visualización de datos | R-bloggers
raw_json.main_html:
R Para Ciencia de Datos – Explorar – Visualización de datos

Posted on September 29, 2025 by pacha.dev/blog in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on pacha.dev/blog, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

If this post is useful to you I kindly ask a minimal donation on Buy Me a Coffee. It shall be used to continue my Open Source efforts. The full explanation is here: A Personal Message from an Open Source Contributor.

You can send me questions for the blog using this form and subscribe to receive an email when there is a new post.

Lectura guiada del capítulo 3 de ‘R Para Ciencia de Datos’ (https://es.r4ds.hadley.nz/03-visualize.html).

Jueves 2 de Octubre 19.30 de Chile https://www.youtube.com/live/wTVeMl6i1cg

Sábado 4 de Octubre 15.00 de Chile https://www.youtube.com/live/2L2DpGCFVm4

Donación voluntaria: https://buymeacoffee.com/pacha

La última realización salió bastante bien pero me olvidé de grabar, por lo que repetiré el capítulo 3 este jueves y además el sábado.

¡Los espero!

Related

To leave a comment for the author, please follow the link and comment on their blog: pacha.dev/blog.
R-bloggers.com offers daily e-mail updates about R news and tutorials about learning R and many other topics. Click here if you're looking to post or find an R/data-science job.
